```{r}

library(here)
library(tidyverse)
#library(stars)
library(sf)
library(tmap)
```

```{r}

#shp is esri file depends on all other files in folder

col <- st_read(here("data", "Colombia", "Colombia.shp"))

roads <- st_read(here("data", "RDLINE_colombia", "RDLINE_colombia.shp"))

aves <- read_csv(here("data", "dataves.csv"))

```
 
```{r}
aves_tibble <- aves %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  rename(long = decimal_longitude) %>%
  mutate(lat = decimal_latitude) %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("long", "lat"), crs = 4326) 
  #need coord ref system (crs) for spatial object

```
 
```{r}
unique(st_geometry_type(aves_tibble))

```
 
```{r}
col_andean <- col %>%
  mutate(N1_MacroBi = as.factor(N1_MacroBi)) %>%
  filter(N1_MacroBi == "Andean")
```
 
```{r}

st_crs(col)
st_crs(col)$units
```

```{r}

st_crs(col) == st_crs(aves_tibble)
```

```{r}
aves_tibble <- st_transform(aves_tibble, crs = st_crs(col))

st_crs(col) == st_crs(aves_tibble)

```
